Description: Standing wooden figure of a woman, wearing a heavy wig of New-Kingdom style; the right arm is extended by the side, the left is crossed over the body. The left hand has been broken. Stands on a rectanngular wooden plinth with the left leg advanced. There is a deep crack in the front, running from the head down into the body.
Exhibition history: Exhibited: 1995 Feb-May, Atlanta, Emory University, Reflections of Women in the New Kingdom
